name: Techspire LLC
description:
TechSpire is a well-established IT company, which specializes in mobile and web development as well as enterprise solutions. For over 7 years we have delivered quality projects for global customers.
 
We provide:
Technology consulting
Custom software development
Software product development
Enterprise application integration
Software Quality Assurance (QA) & Testing
SAAS Solutions
Software prototyping
Dedicated development teams
Maintenance & support
Why work with us: 
1. Experienced team, capable of handling projects of virtually any size. 
2. Effective communication: office in Canada, highly trained managers. 
3. Good rates thanks to a development office in Eastern Europe.
4. Full cycle development. We can work on your product through all stages of its creation.
